GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
clk: socfpga: Fix memory leak in socfpga_gate_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 3e8fd1d0fab4d5c9a50d225dddc207deac12f13a, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit a30a67be7b6e1117e0c0f5bcf84328ccdb8d6205. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: clk: socfpga: Fix memory leak in socfpga_gate_init()
